overview: Paris, Latin Quarter.  A small cinema that is both famous and marginal, Action Christine.  The cashier has taken her camcorder and takes us to this public place, her workplace.  Place of life, of passage, of meeting, a window open on the street, behind the hygienic phone, it is the daily life of the cashiers and the openers punctuated by the alternation of surging entrances and idle intersession.
title: La Caissière fait son cinéma
